item.title: How to take over the computer of any Java (or Clojure or Scala) developer
item.description: Update: 07/31/2014 Sonatype has reacted to this post and will soon be turning on SSL access for all users. Their blog post announcing this is here. I’m very happy that they are making this change, and the Java ecosystem is going to be more secure for it! That being said, if you’re reading this and are thinking of charging $10 to gauge the true demand for security features in your product, don’t.
